ModMetaData.description:
Discord: Steveo.o steam: Scurvyez
A simple, yet... heart-warming, mod that adds fireflies to the Rim (as pure visual effects). Will I be adding more visual effects such as butterflies, embers, etc? No. This mod is about fireflies only. I might make a separate mod for more general ambient effects in the future though.
